prasenjitm wrote:
> It seems that we are supporting only GET/POST HTTP protocols  in
> FetchHTTP. 
Thats right.

> There could be some valid cases (e.g. for HUGE files)  where
> you may not want to download the whole file, and do just a validity
> check by doing HTTP HEAD. Any plans to get that fix  in FecthHTTP ?
>
Not currently.  Would need a processor that knew what to do with the 
return from a HEAD request (I presume you have such a beastie?). 

> I have made that change  locally, but it would be nice to have that get
> done in Heritrix itself.
>
How do you enable/disable the HEAD request? Is total crawl done making 
HEAD requests?

If the HEAD request can be done as an option, send over a patch Prasen 
and we'll add it in.

Yours,
St.Ack
